summary.overview: The CCUP transaction provides a comprehensive credit card management interface that allows authorized users to search, view, and update credit card information including cardholder details, card status, and expiry dates. The system includes user authentication, menu navigation, and administrative functions with proper access controls to ensure only authorized personnel can modify card data.
business_functions: User Authentication - Validate user credentials and determine access level (admin or regular user)
Menu Navigation - Display appropriate menu options based on user type and handle menu selections
Administrative Menu Access - Provide admin users with specialized administrative functions
Credit Card Search - Accept account and card number criteria to locate specific credit cards
Card Information Retrieval - Fetch and display complete credit card details for review
Data Validation - Validate all input fields including account numbers, card numbers, names, status, and expiry dates
Change Detection - Compare modified data with original values to identify what has been changed
Update Confirmation - Present changes to user for confirmation before applying updates
Card Record Update - Apply validated changes to the credit card database
Access Control Enforcement - Restrict regular users from accessing administrative functions
Session Management - Handle user sessions and redirect to sign-on when needed
Error Handling - Display appropriate error messages for validation failures and system issues

CCUP.program_overview: Credit card update transaction for searching and modifying card details
